author: Hannah Al-Othman
title: The Family Of A 13-Year-Old Boy Who Died From Coronavirus Has Told People To Stay At Home
description: The family of 13-year-old Ismail Mohamed Abdulwahab issued the heartfelt plea saying they are "heartbroken as a family due to the devastation caused by the coronavirus." View Entire Post ›
content:
